text:
Normal use of junit, without static instance variables in the test class.
Sampler isn't calling setup and teardown before the tests, regardless of whether
or not the checkbox has been selected
creator: inderjeet.lalli@ranplc.co.uk

text:
have you read the JUnitSampler tutorial?  jmeter' junitsampler works quite
different than a standard JUnit runner. without an actual test case, it's going
to be hard to debug this. we use the junitsampler at work and it calls
setup/teardown correctly.
creator: woolfel@yahoo.com
woolfel@yahoo.com
